```{r}
setwd("~/Documents/Carabeo Lab/R Code/Paper 2/Supplementary Figure 4c-d")
library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
atc<-read.csv("SuppFig4cd_06302020.csv")
atc$Treatment2<-factor(atc$Treatment, levels=c("aTc+", "aTc-"))
www<-subset(atc, ID%in%c("WWW"))
wilcox.test(Mean~Treatment, data=www)
yyf<-subset(atc, ID%in%c("YYF"))
wilcox.test(Mean~Treatment, data=yyf)
ggboxplot(www, x="Treatment2", y="Mean", fill="Treatment2", palette=c("lightyellow3", "lightyellow"), title="WWW") + ylab(label="MFI") + rremove('xlab') + stat_compare_means(comparisons=list(c("aTc+", "aTc-")), label="p.signif", method="wilcox.test", label.y=1500) + scale_y_continuous(expand=expand_scale(mult=c(0.1,0.1))) + rremove('legend') + theme(line=element_line(size=1, colour="black"), panel.border=element_rect(colour="black", fill="NA", size=1)) + theme(plot.title=element_text(hjust='0.5'))
ggboxplot(yyf, x="Treatment2", y="Mean", fill="Treatment2", palette=c("lightyellow3", "lightyellow"), title="YYF") + ylab(label="MFI") + rremove('xlab') + stat_compare_means(comparisons=list(c("aTc+", "aTc-")), label="p.signif", method="wilcox.test", label.y=1500) + scale_y_continuous(expand=expand_scale(mult=c(0.1,0.1))) + rremove('legend') + theme(line=element_line(size=1, colour="black"), panel.border=element_rect(colour="black", fill="NA", size=1)) + theme(plot.title=element_text(hjust='0.5'))
```
